about_the_game:
Raise your new friend in a horror themed pet simulation!

As a new owner, it is your responsibility to get to know your buddy! Each has it's own set of likes, and dislikes which can
effect how they interact with not only you, but any of your neighbors. If developed right, you will not have a problem, but...
if not appeased, chances are you'll end up in jail, covering up murder, or even as dinner yourself!

These horrors must stay, Happy, Healthy, Fed, and Beautiful!

Friends and neighbors will often visit, or you will see them on walks. They also have their own personalities, so figure which stat
correlates with the neighbor to keep your monster from lashing out! Wouldn't want the police coming around asking questions.

Good luck to you and your new buddy!

  • Raise 4 horrors!
  • Each horror grows and changes at 2 weeks in!
  • Unlock 9 unique endings! Some with variations.
